history.title: Our History
history.description: Henrique Store was born from the passion for offering quality products at affordable prices. We started as a small local store and today we are one of the main references in e-commerce.
history.mission: Our mission is to connect you to the best products, with the best shopping experience possible.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: We always seek excellence in everything we do, from customer service to delivery.

customerFirst.title: Customer First
customerFirst.description: Our customers are our priority. Your satisfaction is our goal.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We are always looking for new ways to improve your shopping experience.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.description: We act with transparency in all our relationships and negotiations.

quality.title: Quality
quality.description: We carefully select each product to ensure the best quality.

fastDelivery.title: Fast Delivery
fastDelivery.description: We deliver throughout Brazil with speed and security.

security.title: Security
security.description: Your information is protected with the highest security.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: We are here to help you

form.title: Send a Message
form.name: Name
form.subject: Subject
form.success: Message sent successfully! We will contact you soon.

tracking.question: How do I track my order?
tracking.answer: You will receive an email with the tracking code as soon as the order is shipped. You can also track it in your account.

delivery.question: What is the delivery time?
delivery.answer: The deadline varies from 2 to 7 business days, depending on your location and the type of shipping chosen.

returns.question: How do exchanges/returns work?
returns.answer: You have 7 days to request an exchange or return. Contact us to start the process.

payment.question: What payment methods do you accept?
payment.answer: We accept credit cards, debit cards, PIX, bank slip and transfer.

footer.description: Your trusted online store for quality products. We offer a wide variety of products with fast and secure delivery.
